body_html: Given many very tricky bugs in spectral norm (should be easily implementable on the first glance, but in fact no): https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/issues?q=is%3Aissue+spectral+norm+is%3Aclosed , do you have any thoughts on an abstraction for this sort of thing that reliably: #7313 ?

body: Given many very tricky bugs in spectral norm (should be easily implementable on the first glance, but in fact no): https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/issues?q=is%3Aissue+spectral+norm+is%3Aclosed , do you have any thoughts on an abstraction for this sort of thing that reliably: https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/issues/7313 ?
